actorHoldingDescInventoryListerLongobject

msg_neu.t[4666]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

Special inventory lister for non-player character descriptions - long form lister. This is used to display the inventory of an NPC as part of the full description of the NPC. This long form lister is meant for actors with lengthy descriptions. We start the inventory listing on a new line, and use the actor's full name in the list preface. **`actorHoldingDescInventoryListerLong`**` :   `[`actorInventoryLister`](../object/actorInventoryLister.html)
